channel.title: CVE Feed for Feedify – Web Push Notifications -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Feedify – Web Push Notifications -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38352|2024-08-04T01:37:16.564Z -- feedify%20%E2%80%93%20web%20push%20notifications -- feedify%20%E2%80%93%20web%20push%20notifications
item.description: The Feedify – Web Push Notifications WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the feedify_msg parameter found in the ~/includes/base.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 2.1.8.
